mdRecord.dcterms:title: Red Cross nursing certificate
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: American Red Cross [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "The American National Red Cross to Mrs. Ella Whitten Akers, Red Cross Nurse - World War I, in grateful appreciation for untiring efforts and willingness to give time, energy and talents to promote Red Cross nursing through fifty years of continuous vounteer service. Metropolitan Lynchburg Chapter, March 21, 1967, Franklin H.(?) Whitten, Chariman"
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Awards
